vignettes.title: Adult survivor seeks exam and advocacy
vignettes.persona: Adult survivor in rural county, limited transportation
vignettes.scenario: Following an assault, the survivor first contacts 9-1-1, then is transported to a hospital for a forensic exam and wishes to connect with advocacy and safety planning.
goals: Access forensic exam within time window
Connect with advocacy for safety planning

metadata.notes: Labels in preferred/observed may be system types or node labels. Fuzzy matching will attempt to resolve.

vignettes.title: Campus survivor requests confidential support
vignettes.scenario: Student discloses to a campus counselor and wants confidential advocacy and medical care without immediate police involvement.

vignettes.title: Military spouse survivor discloses to chaplain
vignettes.persona: Spouse of active-duty service member living near base housing
vignettes.scenario: After a violent incident at home, the survivor seeks help from a base chaplain, leading to engagement with military police and a warm handoff to civilian/military-connected advocacy.
goals: Connection to advocacy and legal options across military/civilian systems
barriers: Concern about impact on service member's career

metadata.notes: Local implementations may model 'Chaplain' as a node label under Faith-Based Org or a specific base resource.

vignettes.title: Teen in foster care discloses at school
vignettes.scenario: Teen discloses to a trusted teacher; a report is made and CPS engages. The teen needs a CAC exam, advocacy, and court accompaniment.

vignettes.title: Tribal community survivor seeks care and legal follow-up
vignettes.persona: Adult survivor residing in Tribal community
vignettes.scenario: Survivor first contacts a Tribal advocate; transportation is needed to the nearest regional hospital for a forensic exam; cross-jurisdictional legal follow-up required.

vignettes.title: Non-English speaker in rural area needs SANE access
vignettes.scenario: Survivor calls a regional hotline; an interpreter is engaged; survivor is connected to nearest SANE program for an exam and advocacy follow-up.
